title: Emerald and Diamond Grandeur: A Contemporary Haaram
materials: Platinum base with 18K Yellow Gold accents. Features natural
vibrant green Emeralds (59.43 carats total) with excellent clarity and brilliant cut. Adorned with D color
internally flawless (IF) diamonds totaling approximately 17 carats (based on the provided weight distribution). Polished to a Hyderabadi sheen.
features: This contemporary Haaram reimagines traditional South Indian necklace designs. The necklace showcases large, rectangular emeralds surrounded by a cluster of round brilliant diamonds. The diamond floral lattice structure adds a modern, delicate touch. The setting is designed for optimal light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of both the diamonds and emeralds.
colors: Predominantly white (diamonds) and green (emeralds) with warm yellow gold highlights that perfectly contrast with the platinum
creating a rich and balanced aesthetic.
occasions: or as a statement piece at high-end galas. Also suitable for modern brides seeking a blend of tradition and contemporary style for their wedding day
or any special occasion where sophisticated elegance is desired.
description: This Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and superior quality. The combination of rare emeralds and dazzling diamonds makes it a truly unique and valuable heirloom. The modern design elements add a contemporary flair to a classic South Indian style, ensuring its timeless appeal. Crafted to last generations, and radiates exquisite craftsmanship, it's an investment piece you will be proud to own.
